com.github.mattficken.io.ui
Class FontManager

java.lang.Object
  com.github.mattficken.io.ui.FontManager

public final class FontManager
extends java.lang.Object

Manages fonts, primarily internationalized fonts to make sure that fonts exist to support displaying chars from charsets the debugger supports.

Author:
matt
